data.persona: I ride in boats to catch fish. I catch fish in the ocean. I usually get a boat full of fish.
data.description:
You are in the Fishing Store.
This store is a small one room stone building with wares laid about on tables.  One can see fishing poles, wooden buckets with dirt and bait inside, along with some mounted trophies.
The mermaid is here.

You are carrying a weights and a pouch, and wearing a polishing cloths, a white cloth, an knife, and a ceremonial hat.

data.short_motivation: I need to put weights into the pouch so I don't lose them.
data.mid_motivation: I need the weights for my fishing line when I am at sea.
data.long_motivation: The weights will bring the fishing line down to the ocean's floor where I can catch all the biggest and tastiest fish.
